text: Omar Sy (born 20 January 1978) is a French actor and comedian. He is best known in France for his duo with Fred Testot, Omar et Fred, and for his role in The Intouchables. Internationally, he is known for his roles in X-Men: Days of Future Past and Jurassic World.Biography on Première.fr Sy received a César Award for Best Actor on 24 February 2012 for his role in The Intouchables and in doing so also became the first actor of African descent to win the French award. Sy is a Muslim. His parents are both immigrants from West Africa. ==References== ==Other websites== * Omar et Fred * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French voice actors Category:French comedians Category:Muslims
title: Omar Sy
